rdf:Description.dc:title: The Piskey-Purse: Legends and Tales of North Cornwall
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Enys Tregarthen [Pseud. of Nellie Sloggett (1851–1923)]
J. Ley Pethybridge (1865–)

rdf:Description.dc:subject: Tales, English -- England Cornwall
Legends -- England Cornwall
Folklore -- England Cornwall
rdf:Description.dc:description: Contains five stories: The Piskey-purse.—The magic pail.—The witch in the well.—Borrowed eyes and ears.—The little white hare.
